title: ALWAYS, ALL WAYS
lyrics:
Janjanhaessdeon ne mam-eun imi
Nalan gamdang moshal padoga ilji
Oh aljiman jom deo neol ewossago sip-eo
Deo gip-i ppajyeodeulge nwadugo sip-eo
Milo sog-e gadhin geoscheoleom

Deo heeonal sujocha eobs-eul geol

Gappajineun simjangsoli jeomjeom deo keojyeo

Meolis-sog-eun ojig nalo gadeug chage mandeul-eo neol



Always nae hyang-gie All ways chwihage hae

All day nal wonhaneun Your face

Oh ah

Beos-eonal su eobs-i ppalli

Beos-eonal su eobs-i beonjin

Naleul chajneun neoui mam-i

Nal jjochneun neoui mam-i

Always neukkyeojiji Always, All ways



Ppajyeodeune gip-i

Al su eobsneun neukkim

Naege mwol hangeoni

Eojileon i neukkim



Algo sip-eo Always

All ways, Always



Deul-yeoda bwado jeonhyeo

Neolan ael moleugess-eo (I donâ€™t know)

Jeonghaejin teul ttawin eobsneun neukkim

Teugbyeolhan beil-e galin geos gat-a



Ne gamgag-eul eojileobge hae

Jeonbu nae mamdaelo dasi baeyeolhae

Neol kkeul-eodang-gyeo naman boige

Gakkawojyeo seolo-ege You



Always nae hyang-gie All ways chwihage hae

All day nal wonhaneun Your face

Oh ah

Beos-eonal su eobs-i ppalli

Beos-eonal su eobs-i beonjin

Naleul chajneun neoui mam-i

Nal jjochneun neoui mam-i

Always neukkyeojiji Always, All ways



You can spend the night, spend the night

Nae gyeot-eseo

If it feels right, feels right

Nae pum-eseo



Tteugeowojin ma-eum-i (ma-eum-i)

Neoleul buleun ma-eum-i (ma-eum-i) yeah



Bunmyeonghage bichnan bichnan i sungan-e

Oh neoman-eul heolaghae



Always hansungan-e All ways neol ilhge hae

All day naege nun meon Your face

Oh ah

Beos-eonal su eobs-i ppalli

Beos-eonal su eobs-i beonjin

Naleul chajneun neoui mam-i

Nal jjochneun neoui mam-i

Always deo gip-eojyeo Always, All ways



Ppajyeodeune gip-i

Al su eobsneun neukkim

Naege mwol hangeoni

Eojileon i neukkim



Algo sip-eo always

All ways, Always



All ways, Always

All ways, Always
